title: When I spot a stealthed unit with my Siphon of Destruction

replies.body: Would it be better if it was {{champion:112}}  Von Doom?
Shh... I don't want people to know that I'm actually on a Viktor trip right now o_O
When you laser beam and kill an invisible {{champion:17}}
Ah, I know that feeling. Once you hear that crunch and see nothing, you know you've done good.
FOOT DIVE FOOT DIVE FOOT DIVE

> [{quoted}](name=Ayketh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VQzKqMpO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-01T01:14:02.390+0000)
>
> FOOT DIVE FOOT DIVE FOOT DIVE

Na bro, you can foot dive all you want, It's all about them finger lasers. Didn't the gif show you anything?
My favorite thing about DFT is the visual feedback when you hit someone, helps for checking bushes and stealthed champs.
But how does Morde do anything to an invisible unit other than his E (and W, but barely any damage).
When you're playing {{champion:25}}  and {{champion:28}}  thinks she can sneak past you

Isn't siphon of destruction nasus' q? How do you do that.... Its so magical

Edit: Oh wait. thats a morde skill... I didn't realize this was a Malicious Metal post.
